name: Luminite
description:
Created in 1 week for the Unreal Engine 4 Mega Jam 2017.

This is a multiplayer or local co-op game! Singleplayer requires BOTH a controller and a keyboard & mouse but is not recommended.

Created by:

@boatsqt

@jsinderman

Madeleine Spangler

Luminite is a co-op Puzzle Platformer.  Singleplayer requires both a controller and a keyboard & mouse. It is highly recommended you play either couch-coop or online coop.

Traverse limbo, utilizing a harmony between Light and Darkness in this 3rd person co-op puzzler where light expands, grows, and progresses and darkness restricts, lowers, and constrains.

WASD/Left Joystick - Move
Mouse/Right Joystick - Rotate Camera
Space Bar / Bottom Face Button - Manipulate Space
R / Top Face Button - Reset Puzzle
Enter - Chat (Online / LAN only)
